'''''The Stranding of the Beagle''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Researcher's Notes]]''.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to a 1839 book ''{{w|The Voyage of the Beagle}}'' written by Charles Darwin.
